snippet: Jacksonville, which has the lowest-ranked offense, spent more than $3 million to build a luxurious locker room at EverBank Field in a visible attempt at turning its image around.
abstract: Jacksonville Jaguars, NFL's lowest-ranked offense and among the worst run defenses this season, spent more than $3 million to build league's most luxurious locker room at EverBank Field in an attempt to burnish the team's image.
lead_paragraph: Jacksonville, which has the lowest-ranked offense, spent more than $3 million to build a luxurious locker room at EverBank Field in a visible attempt at turning its image around.

headline.seo: Jaguars Hope Luxurious Locker Room Will Overhaul Image
headline.main: A Luxury Locker Room for a Team That Has Been a Bit of a Fixer-Upper
headline.print_headline: A Luxury Locker Room for a Team That Has Been a Bit of a Fixer-Upper
